name: PandaMan VR
description:
Enjoy the thrill of pacman but in virtual reality.

The Game currently supports Oculus Rift and Oculus Rift S only. Future updates will support it on Quest, Vive etc.

You can also check out my Youtube channel to know more about the games I make and you can also suggest me what you would like to play in VR next :)

Lazy Panda - YouTube
